gridProxyDestroy

public static void gridProxyDestroy()
Writes random data in the default local proxy file and then deletes it.

gridProxyInit

public static void gridProxyInit(char[] passwd)
                          throws IOException,
                                 GSSException,
                                 Exception
Calls gridProxyInit(char[] passwd, int lifetime_in_hours) with a default lifetime of 12 hours

Parameters:
passwd - the passphrase of the private key
Throws:
Exception - if some general error occured
GSSException - if something was wrong with the gsscredential
IOException - if the proxy could not be written to disk

gridProxyInit

public static void gridProxyInit(char[] passwd,
                                 int lifetime_in_hours)
                          throws IOException,
                                 GSSException,
                                 Exception
A helper method to do the equivalent of grid-proxy-init in Java. It creates a proxy from the local usercert/userkey and writes it to disk (e.g. /tmp/x509up_uXXX on linux).

Parameters:
passwd - the passphrase of the private key in the .globus folder
lifetime_in_hours - how long should the proxy be valid for
Throws:
Exception - if some general error occured
GSSException - if something was wrong with the gsscredential
IOException - if the proxy could not be written to disk

loadGlobusCredential

public static org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential loadGlobusCredential()
                                                            throws org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException
Loads the local proxy into a GlobusCredential.

Returns:
the credential
Throws:
org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException

loadGSSCredential

public static GSSCredential loadGSSCredential()
                                       throws org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException
Loads the local proxy into a GSSCredential.

Returns:
the credential
Throws:
org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException - if something goes wrong

validGridProxyExists

public static boolean validGridProxyExists()
Checks whether there is a local grid proxy on the default location

Returns:
true - if there is, false - if there is not a valid proxy

validGridProxyExists

public static boolean validGridProxyExists(int minTimeInMinutes)
Checks whether there is a local grid proxy on the default location

Parameters:
minTimeInMinutes - minimum time the credential should be valid for
Returns:
true - if there is and it's lifetime >= the specified min time, false - if there is not a valid proxy or the lifetime is shorter
